org.apache.flink.streaming.connectors.kafka

类 KafkaTableSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.streaming.connectors.kafka.KafkaTableSource
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    org.apache.flink.table.sources.DefinedProctimeAttribute, org.apache.flink.table.sources.DefinedRowtimeAttributes, org.apache.flink.table.sources.StreamTableSource<Row>, org.apache.flink.table.sources.TableSource<Row>
    直接已知子类:
    Kafka010TableSource, Kafka011TableSource, Kafka08TableSource, Kafka09TableSource, KafkaAvroTableSource, KafkaJsonTableSource

    public abstract class KafkaTableSource
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.apache.flink.table.sources.StreamTableSource<Row>, org.apache.flink.table.sources.DefinedProctimeAttribute, org.apache.flink.table.sources.DefinedRowtimeAttributes
    A version-agnostic Kafka StreamTableSource.

    The version-specific Kafka consumers need to extend this class and override createKafkaConsumer(String, Properties, DeserializationSchema)}.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      protected static class  KafkaTableSource.Builder<T extends KafkaTableSource,B extends KafkaTableSource.Builder>
      Abstract builder for a KafkaTableSource to be extended by builders of subclasses of KafkaTableSource.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      private java.lang.String proctimeAttribute
      Field name of the processing time attribute, null if no processing time field is defined.
      private java.util.Properties properties
      Properties for the Kafka consumer.
      private TypeInformation<Row> returnType
      Type information describing the result type.
      private java.util.List<org.apache.flink.table.sources.RowtimeAttributeDescriptor> rowtimeAttributeDescriptors
      Descriptor for a rowtime attribute.
      private org.apache.flink.table.api.TableSchema schema
      The schema of the table.
      private java.util.Map<KafkaTopicPartition,java.lang.Long> specificStartupOffsets
      Specific startup offsets; only relevant when startup mode is StartupMode.SPECIFIC_OFFSETS.
      private StartupMode startupMode
      The startup mode for the contained consumer (default is StartupMode.GROUP_OFFSETS).
      private java.lang.String topic
      The Kafka topic to consume.

    • 构造器概要

                           java.util.Properties properties,
                           org.apache.flink.table.api.TableSchema schema,
                           TypeInformation<Row> returnType)
        Creates a generic Kafka StreamTableSource.
        参数:
        topic - Kafka topic to consume.
        properties - Properties for the Kafka consumer.
        schema - Schema of the produced table.
        returnType - Type information of the produced physical DataStream.

      • getKafkaConsumer

        protected FlinkKafkaConsumerBase<Row> getKafkaConsumer(java.lang.String topic,
                                                       java.util.Properties properties,
                                                       DeserializationSchema<Row> deserializationSchema)
        Returns a version-specific Kafka consumer with the start position configured.
        参数:
        topic - Kafka topic to consume.
        properties - Properties for the Kafka consumer.
        deserializationSchema - Deserialization schema to use for Kafka records.
        返回:
        The version-specific Kafka consumer

      • setProctimeAttribute

        protected void setProctimeAttribute(java.lang.String proctimeAttribute)
        Declares a field of the schema to be the processing time attribute.
        参数:
        proctimeAttribute - The name of the field that becomes the processing time field.

      • setSpecificStartupOffsets

        protected void setSpecificStartupOffsets(java.util.Map<KafkaTopicPartition,java.lang.Long> specificStartupOffsets)
        Sets the startup offsets of the TableSource; only relevant when the startup mode is StartupMode.SPECIFIC_OFFSETS.
        参数:
        specificStartupOffsets - The startup offsets for different partitions.
